org.openorb.PI
Class CodecFactoryManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.omg.CORBA.LocalObject
        |
        +--org.openorb.PI.CodecFactoryManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CodecFactory, CodecFactoryManager, CodecFactoryOperations, IDLEntity, Object, java.io.Serializable
public class CodecFactoryManagerImpl
extends LocalObject
implements CodecFactory, CodecFactoryManager

This class implements the Codec Factory. It is used to return a Codec according to a encoding format.
